awareness_hub.title: Indian Market ki Jaankari
awareness_hub.description: Indian market ko confidence ke saath samjhein. Fundamentals se lekar strategic insights tak, ek 3-level ka course.
awareness_hub.level_1_description: Indian market ke zaroori concepts ke saath ek mazboot base banayein.
awareness_hub.level_2_description: India mein kaam karne ki barikiyon mein gehrai se utrein.
awareness_hub.level_3_description: Lambi avadhi ki safalta ke liye unnat ranneetiyon mein maharat haasil karein.

foundation.title: Level 1: Buniyaad - Zaroori Baatein
foundation.description: Indian market mein apna safar shuru karein. Yeh foundational lessons aapko India ke complex aur dynamic environment ko samajhne ke liye zaroori knowledge denge.
foundation.module_1_description: India ki economy aur society ki badi picture ko samajhna.
foundation.cultural_diversity: Cultural Diversity: Ek Desh, Anek Rashtra
foundation.module_2_description: India mein business karne ke mukhya pehlu.
foundation.ease_of_doing_business: Ease of Doing Business: Sachai vs. Afwahein
foundation.indian_contracts: Indian Contracts ke Bhool Bhulaiya mein Navigate karna
foundation.module_3_description: Sabse zaroori insaan ko samajhna: aapka customer.
foundation.winning_trust: Kam Vishwas Wale Samaj Mein Vishwas Jeetna

professional.title: Level 2: Professional - Barikiyon ko Samajhna
professional.description: Yeh level unke liye hai jinko Indian market ki basic samajh hai aur ab operational aur strategic chunautiyon mein gehrai se utarna chahte hain.
professional.module_4_description: Kanooni aur naukarshahi ke landscape mein gehrai se utarna.
professional.ease_of_doing_business: Ease of Doing Business: Myth vs. Reality
professional.indian_contracts: Navigating the Labyrinth of Indian Contracts
professional.module_5_description: Vividh aur viksit hote Bhartiya grahak ko samajhna.
professional.digital_native: The Rise of the Digital Native
professional.winning_trust: Winning Trust in a Low-Trust Society
professional.module_6_description: India mein apne business ko safaltapoorvak launch karne aur badhane ki ranneetiyan.
